name: Rushing Hound: Swift as the Wind
description: When your Gorou, who has this card equipped, is on the field, and after any of your characters deals Geo DMG: If General's War Banner is in play, draw 1 card. (Once per Round)
descriptionraw: When your $[A1606], who has this card equipped, is on the field, and after any of your characters deals $[K106]: If <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116061]</color> is in play, draw 1 card. (Once per Round)
descriptionreplaced: When your Gorou, who has this card equipped, is on the field, and after any of your characters deals {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>: If <color=#FFFFFFFF>General's War Banner</color> is in play, draw 1 card. (Once per Round)
